text: Soln to:  "TypeError at /register/ save() got an unexpected keyword argument 'force_insert'" ...    A change to the def save(self) - within Profile - of adding **kwargs as an additional parameter seems to fix the problem:  class Profile(models.Model):      user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)     image = models.ImageField(default='default.jpg', upload_to='profile_pics')      def __str__(self):         return f'{self.user.username} Profile'      def save(self, **kwargs):         super().save()          img = Image.open(self.image.path)         if img.height > 300 or img.width > 300:             output_size = (300, 300)             img.thumbnail(output_size)             img.save(self.image.path)
